title: Close Savings Account
description: A customer wants to close their savings account and transfer the balance to their checking account.

tasks.description: Authenticate the customer and verify their request.
Check the savings account balance and transfer the full amount to the customer's checking account.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully transfers the remaining balance.

tasks.description: Close the savings account and provide confirmation to the customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully closes the account and confirms the action.
